page.title: 10THE KINGSWOOD ESTATE
page.content: We went for a walk around the {Kingswood}estate from the{Danesholme estate.The buildings on the two estates are very{similar},although we think that there is more grass on Danesholme.There were lots of back alleys which made the estate appear like a{maze. Quite a few of the houses were not lived in and had been vandalised.There was a lot of repair and building work going on . We met some of the residents on the estate and they told us that there was not much to do on the estate. Some of the shops on the estates had there windows covered over with hardboard to stop them from being {smashed. When we were walking around the estate we came across a{plaque}saying that the estate was well{designed!
